desc: Save over 22kgs with the Latest Lithium Iron Phosphate (LiFePO4) Battery Technology. Our products use the latest lithium battery technology (Lithium iron phosphate - LiFePO4). Suitable for race cars, track cars and high performance road cars. Tested extensively on the Nurburgring. a123 cells.

layout.text: “Adding power makes you faster on the straights; subtracting weight makes you faster everywhere”
Colin Chapman, the founder of Lotus
